paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the KCNH2 gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: KCNH2 c.2771G>A was identified in a patient with Long QT syndrome.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with Long QT syndrome, affecting cardiac repolarization.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the family.
variants.population_frequency: Not available in gnomAD or other databases.
variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on clinical presentation.
variants.additional_notes: The variant is listed in HGMD as a disease-causing mutation.
key_quotes: KCNH2 c.2771G>A was identified in a patient with Long QT syndrome.

tables_processed.table_caption: HGMD or ClinVar reported disease-causing or pathogenic mutations in sudden arrhythmic death syndrome or cardiomyopathy in 1KTW-WGS individuals.
